name: ToyBotTouchdown™
0:
”Alexa, open Toy Bot Touchdown”
”Alexa, start Toy Bot Touchdown”
”Alexa, launch Toy Bot Touchdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: toy bot touchdown
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In this game, kids play their favorite football team as they try to outscore their soft companion. Kids get to pass or run and if they get a touchdown, they can do their very own touchdown dance! Suitable for all ages… and great for young kids interested in football (like our kids)!!

About SayKid
SayKid combines voice technology with tangible play to help kids learn in an actively-engaging way - without screens! SayKid won the Grand Prize in the Amazon Alexa EdTech Challenge, has been recognized by Harvard, and was the subject of a recent TEDx Talk: “Can a Toy Transform Education?”

For more screen-free educational experiences, search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill Store. 

We strive to give parents and educators tools to help kids learn - without screens! If you enjoyed this game, we’d be so grateful if you left us a review!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
